metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15365 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: sql/event_data_objects.cc in MariaDB before 10.1.30 and 10.2.x before 10.2.10 and Percona XtraDB Cluster before 5.6.37-26.21-3 and 5.7.x before 5.7.19-29.22-3 allows remote authenticated users with SQL access to bypass intended access restrictions and replicate data definition language (DDL) statements to cluster nodes by leveraging incorrect ordering of DDL replication and ACL checking.

notes.Note: leosilva> following debian notes and code check mysql-5.5 is not affected mdeslaur> possibly mariadb specific issue, marking mysql as not-affected for now

criterions.comment: percona-server-5.6 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
